description.zh-cn: 在中国的重要民族主义与政治概念，通常指代中国各民族的总称或一个统一的国族实体。
description.en: An important nationalist and political concept in China, generally referring to the collective of all ethnic groups in China or a unified national entity.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代思想家、政治家、学者，维新派代表人物，于1902年首次提出“中华民族”概念。
description.en: A modern Chinese thinker, politician, and scholar, representative of the reformists, who first proposed the concept of 'Zhonghua Minzu' in 1902.

description.zh-cn: 于1912年在中国大陆成立的共和制国家。
description.en: A republican state founded in mainland China in 1912.

description.zh-cn: 于1949年在中国大陆成立的社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state founded in mainland China in 1949.

description.zh-cn: 以汉族为中心的民族主义思想。
description.en: A nationalist ideology centered on the Han ethnic group.

description.zh-cn: 清末主张以暴力革命推翻清朝统治的政治派别，以孙中山为代表。
description.en: Political factions in the late Qing Dynasty that advocated for the overthrow of Qing rule through violent revolution, represented by Sun Yat-sen.

description.zh-cn: 清末主张通过变法维新来改革政治体制的政治派别，以梁启超为代表。
description.en: Political factions in the late Qing Dynasty that advocated for reforming the political system through modernization and reform, represented by Liang Qichao.

description.zh-cn: 清末革命党人提出的旨在推翻满族统治的政治运动及口号。
description.en: A political movement and slogan proposed by revolutionaries in the late Qing Dynasty aimed at overthrowing Manchu rule.

description.zh-cn: 清朝与日本之间的一场战争，其结果加剧了清朝的民族矛盾和统治危机。
description.en: A war between the Qing Dynasty and Japan, the outcome of which exacerbated ethnic conflicts and the crisis of rule in the Qing Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代革命家，中华民国和中国国民党的缔造者之一。
description.en: A modern Chinese revolutionary, one of the founders of the Republic of China and the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国初年的一种政治主张，提倡汉、满、蒙、回、藏五个主要民族的平等与联合。
description.en: A political principle in the early Republic of China advocating for the equality and union of the five main ethnic groups: Han, Manchu, Mongol, Hui, and Tibetan.

description.zh-cn: 中国最后一个帝制王朝，由满族建立。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty of China, established by the Manchu people.

description.zh-cn: 推翻清朝统治、建立中华民国的革命。
description.en: The revolution that overthrew the Qing Dynasty and established the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国社会学家、人类学家，提出中华民族“多元一体”理论。
description.en: A Chinese sociologist and anthropologist who proposed the 'pluralistic unity' theory of the Chinese nation.

description.zh-cn: 以中华民族作为民族国家基础的思想。
description.en: An ideology based on the idea of the Zhonghua Minzu as the foundation of the nation-state.

description.zh-cn: 清末民初政治活动家，立宪派代表人物，提倡将中华民族定义为文化共同体。
description.en: A political activist in the late Qing and early Republican era, a representative of the constitutionalists, who advocated for defining the Chinese nation as a cultural community.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家、军事家，曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: A politician and military leader of the Republic of China, who served as President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发起和领导的在中国发生的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in China initiated and led by Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 由蒋中正在台湾发起，旨在对抗文化大革命，保护和弘扬中华传统文化的运动。
description.en: A movement initiated by Chiang Kai-shek in Taiwan, aimed at countering the Cultural Revolution and preserving and promoting traditional Chinese culture.

description.zh-cn: 日本关东军在中国东北发动的军事入侵事件，是日本侵华战争的开端。
description.en: A military invasion launched by the Japanese Kwantung Army in Northeast China, marking the beginning of the Japanese invasion of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国抵抗日本全面侵略的战争。
description.en: The war of resistance fought by China against a full-scale invasion by Japan.

description.zh-cn: 杨度于1907年发表的文章，对“中华民族”的含义做出阐发，将其定义为文化共同体。
description.en: An article published by Yang Du in 1907, which elaborated on the meaning of 'Zhonghua Minzu' and defined it as a cultural community.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治学家，对中国政治和文化有深入研究。
description.en: An American political scientist with in-depth research on Chinese politics and culture.

description.zh-cn: 由孙中山提出的政治纲领，包含民族主义、民权主义和民生主义。
description.en: A political philosophy developed by Sun Yat-sen, consisting of the principles of nationalism, democracy, and the people's livelihood.

description.zh-cn: 1946年在南京召开，负责制定《中华民国宪法》的国民大会。
description.en: The National Assembly convened in Nanjing in 1946, responsible for drafting the Constitution of the Republic of China.

en: Constitution of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的根本大法，于1946年由制宪国民大会通过。
description.en: The fundamental law of the Republic of China, passed by the Constituent National Assembly in 1946.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as the President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，民主进步党籍立法委员。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and member of the Legislative Yuan for the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国大陆委员会副主任委员兼发言人。
description.en: Deputy Minister and Spokesperson of the Mainland Affairs Council of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 台湾原住民学者、政治人物，曾任行政院原住民族委员会主委。
description.en: A Taiwanese indigenous scholar and politician, who served as the Minister of the Council of Indigenous Peoples.

en: Descendants of Yan and Huang Emperors

description.zh-cn: 中华民族的自称之一，表示为炎帝和黄帝的后代，是中华民族认同的一个核心文化符号。
description.en: A self-appellation of the Chinese nation, signifying descent from the Yan and Huang Emperors, serving as a core cultural symbol of Chinese national identity.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中华民国蒙藏委员会蒙事处处长。
description.en: Former director of the Mongolian Affairs Department of the Mongolian and Tibetan Affairs Commission of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代革命家，中华民国开国元勋。
description.en: A modern Chinese revolutionary and a key figure in the founding of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代革命家。
description.en: A modern Chinese revolutionary.

description.zh-cn: 1912年由黄兴、刘揆等人创立的旨在促进民族平等的社会组织。
description.en: A social organization founded in 1912 by Huang Xing, Liu Kui, and others, aimed at promoting ethnic equality.

description.zh-cn: 清末民初的政治家、军事家，中华民国第一任正式大总统。
description.en: A politician and military leader in the late Qing and early Republican era, the first formal President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1912年由袁世凯下令组成的旨在促进五族融合的组织。
description.en: An organization established in 1912 by order of Yuan Shikai, aimed at promoting the integration of the five ethnic groups.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国民族政策

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国民族政策
en: Ethnic policy of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国处理民族问题的指导原则和方针，以民族平等、团结和共同繁荣为基本原则。
description.en: The guiding principles and policies of the People's Republic of China for handling ethnic issues, based on the fundamental principles of ethnic equality, unity, and common prosperity.

description.zh-cn: 由部分中国学者提出的一套民族政策改革主张，旨在淡化族群意识，强化中华民族的身份认同。
description.en: A set of reform proposals for ethnic policy put forward by some Chinese scholars, aimed at de-emphasizing ethnic consciousness and strengthening the identity of the Zhonghua Minzu.

description.zh-cn: 中国经济学家，第二代民族政策的推动者之一。
description.en: A Chinese economist and one of the proponents of the 'second-generation ethnic policy'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治学者，主张取消民族身份划分。
description.en: A Chinese political scientist who advocates for the abolition of ethnic identity classification.

description.zh-cn: 梁启超于1902年首次提出“中华民族”这一概念。
description.en: Liang Qichao first proposed the concept of 'Zhonghua Minzu' in 1902.

description.zh-cn: 在20世纪初，汉民族主义思想促成了主张“驱除鞑虏，恢复中华”的革命党的形成。
description.en: In the early 20th century, the ideology of Han nationalism contributed to the formation of the Revolutionary Party, which advocated for 'expelling the Manchu barbarians and restoring China'.

description.zh-cn: 维新派警告并反对革命派的“排满”种族革命政治主张。
description.en: The Reformists warned against and opposed the Revolutionary Party's political主張 of 'Anti-Manchu' ethnic revolution.

description.zh-cn: 维新派警告革命派的“排满”主张可能导致国家分裂和列强干预的危险。
description.en: The Reformists warned that the Revolutionary Party's 'Anti-Manchu' stance could lead to national division and foreign intervention.

description.zh-cn: 战争后，清朝民族矛盾加剧，促使以孙中山为代表的革命派纷纷参与革命活动。
description.en: After the war, heightened ethnic conflicts in the Qing Dynasty prompted revolutionaries represented by Sun Yat-sen to engage in revolutionary activities.

description.zh-cn: 晚清政府接纳“五族共和”族群论述，并将其作为朝廷的官方族群政策。
description.en: The late Qing government accepted the 'Five Races Under One Union' discourse and adopted it as the court's official ethnic policy.

description.zh-cn: 辛亥革命后，革命党放弃了种族复仇主义的主张，转而接受“中华民族”观念和“五族共和”政策。
description.en: After the Xinhai Revolution, the Revolutionary Party abandoned its stance of racial revanchism and accepted the concept of 'Zhonghua Minzu' and the 'Five Races Under One Union' policy.

description.zh-cn: 支持中华民族概念，并主张将中国所有各民族融化成一个中华民族。
description.en: Supported the concept of Zhonghua Minzu and advocated for the assimilation of all ethnic groups in China into a single Chinese nation.

description.zh-cn: 提倡中华民族为文化之族名，将其定义为一个文化共同体而非血统共同体。
description.en: Advocated for Zhonghua Minzu as a cultural-ethnic name, defining it as a cultural community rather than a community of blood.

description.zh-cn: 该文对“中华民族”的含义做出进一步阐发，将其定义为一个文化共同体。
description.en: This article further elaborated on the meaning of 'Zhonghua Minzu', defining it as a cultural community.

description.zh-cn: 发起中华文化复兴运动以对抗在中国大陆发生的文化大革命。
description.en: Initiated the Chinese Cultural Renaissance movement to counter the Cultural Revolution taking place in mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 该运动旨在对抗由毛泽东发起的文化大革命，以保护和宏扬中华传统文化。
description.en: The movement was aimed at countering the Cultural Revolution initiated by Mao Zedong, in order to protect and promote traditional Chinese culture.

description.zh-cn: 发起和领导了文化大革命。
description.en: Initiated and led the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 事件之后，中华民族作为中国人整体身份认同的称谓被社会广泛使用和认同。
description.en: After the incident, the term 'Zhonghua Minzu' as a marker of collective identity for the Chinese people came into widespread use and acceptance.

description.zh-cn: 战争的爆发促使中华民族成为凝聚国共合作和民族融合的符号。
description.en: The outbreak of the war promoted 'Zhonghua Minzu' as a symbol to unite the KMT and CCP for cooperation and foster national integration.

description.zh-cn: 梁启超是晚清君主立宪的改革派（维新派）人士代表。
description.en: Liang Qichao was a representative of the reformist faction (Weixinpai) advocating for constitutional monarchy in the late Qing.

description.zh-cn: 孙中山是革命党的代表人物。
description.en: Sun Yat-sen was a representative figure of the Revolutionary Party.

description.zh-cn: 三民主义被制宪国民大会列入中华民国宪法第一条，成为宪政基础。
description.en: The Three Principles of the People were incorporated into the first article of the Constitution of the Republic of China by the Constituent National Assembly, becoming the constitutional foundation.

description.zh-cn: 将三民主义列入《中华民国宪法》第一条。
description.en: Incorporated the Three Principles of the People into Article 1 of the Constitution of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 担任中华民国总统期间，通过举办遥祭黄帝陵等典礼来强化中华民族认同。
description.en: During his presidency of the Republic of China, he strengthened the identity of the Chinese nation by holding ceremonies such as paying remote homage to the Yellow Emperor's Mausoleum.

description.zh-cn: 作为民进党籍立委，质询行政院应否废止中枢祭黄帝陵典礼，此举挑战了与中华民族概念相关的官方仪式。
description.en: As a DPP legislator, he questioned whether the Executive Yuan should abolish the central ceremony for worshiping the Yellow Emperor's Mausoleum, an act that challenged official rituals associated with the concept of the Chinese nation.

description.zh-cn: 认为中华民族是一个将历史、文化、地理等不相干事物掺杂并最终归结到政治的陷阱。
description.en: Believed that the concept of the Chinese nation is a trap that mixes unrelated elements like history, culture, and geography, ultimately boiling down to politics.

description.zh-cn: 在立法院表态称自己不认为是“炎黄子孙”，挑战了中华民族认同的一个核心文化符号。
description.en: Stated in the Legislative Yuan that he does not consider himself a 'descendant of Yan and Huang Emperors', challenging a core cultural symbol of Chinese national identity.

description.zh-cn: 表示自己和成吉思汗都不是“中国人”或“炎黄子孙”，而是“蒙古人”。
description.en: Stated that neither he nor Genghis Khan were 'Chinese' or 'descendants of Yan and Huang Emperors', but rather 'Mongols'.

description.zh-cn: 与刘揆等人共同创立中华民国民族大同会。
description.en: Co-founded the Republic of China National Great Unity Association with Liu Kui and others.

description.zh-cn: 与黄兴等人共同创立中华民国民族大同会。
description.en: Co-founded the Republic of China National Great Unity Association with Huang Xing and others.

description.zh-cn: 批准该会立案并拨给经费支援。
description.en: Approved the registration of the association and provided financial support.

description.zh-cn: 下令组成“五族国民合进会”。
description.en: Ordered the formation of the 'Five Races National Progress Association'.

description.zh-cn: 推动使用“第二代民族政策”以取代现行民族政策，旨在强化中华民族的身份认同。
description.en: Promoted the use of the 'second-generation ethnic policy' to replace the current ethnic policy, aiming to strengthen the identity of the Zhonghua Minzu.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国民族政策

description.zh-cn: 撰文主张取消基于列宁、斯大林马克思主义民族观的民族身份划分制度。
description.en: Wrote articles advocating for the abolition of the ethnic identity classification system based on the Leninist-Stalinist Marxist view of nationality.

description.zh-cn: 批评杨度从文化角度定义的中华民族概念，并提出“中国只是一个文化，却伪装成一个国家”的观点。
description.en: Criticized Yang Du's cultural definition of the Chinese nation, proposing the view that 'China is a civilization pretending to be a state'.
